verses.verse: And <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> made <S%H2859>affinity<s%> with <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, and <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>'s <S%H1323>daughter<s%>, and <S%H935>brought<s%> her into the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%>, until he had made an <S%H3615>end<s%> of <S%H1129>building<s%> his own <S%H1004>house<s%>, and the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and the <S%H2346>wall<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%>.

Only the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H2076>sacrificed<s%> in the high <S%H1116>places<s%>, because there was no <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H1129>built<s%> for the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> until those <S%H3117>days<s%>.

And <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H157>loved<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, <S%H3212>walking<s%> in the <S%H2708>statutes<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%>: only he <S%H2076>sacrificed<s%> and burnt <S%H6999>incense<s%> in the high <S%H1116>places<s%>.

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> to <S%H1391>Gibeon<s%> to <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> <S%H1931>there<s%>; for that was the <S%H1419>great<s%> high <S%H1116>place<s%>: a <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H5930>burnt-offerings<s%> did <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H5927>offer<s%> upon that <S%H4196>altar<s%>.

In <S%H1391>Gibeon<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H7200>appeared<s%> to <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> in a <S%H2472>dream<s%> by <S%H3915>night<s%>; and <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H7592>Ask<s%> what I shall give <S%H5414>thee<s%>.

And <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, Thou hast <S%H6213>showed<s%> unto thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> my <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%>, according as he <S%H1980>walked<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thee in <S%H571>truth<s%>, and in <S%H6666>righteousness<s%>, and in <S%H3483>uprightness<s%> of <S%H3824>heart<s%> with <S%H8104>thee<s%>; and thou hast kept for him this <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%>, that thou hast <S%H5414>given<s%> him a <S%H1121>son<s%> to <S%H3427>sit<s%> on his <S%H3678>throne<s%>, as it is this <S%H3117>day<s%>.

And <S%H3068>now<s%>, O Jehovah my <S%H430>God<s%>, thou hast made thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H4427>king<s%> instead of <S%H1732>David<s%> my <S%H1>father<s%>: and I am but a <S%H6996>little<s%> <S%H5288>child<s%>; I <S%H3045>know<s%> not how to go <S%H3318>out<s%> or come <S%H935>in<s%>.

And thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> is in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of thy <S%H5971>people<s%> which thou hast <S%H977>chosen<s%>, a <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%>, that cannot be <S%H4487>numbered<s%> nor <S%H5608>counted<s%> for <S%H7230>multitude<s%>.

Give <S%H5414><s%> thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> therefore an <S%H8085>understanding<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%> to <S%H8199>judge<s%> thy <S%H5971>people<s%>, that I may <S%H995>discern<s%> between <S%H2896>good<s%> and <S%H7451>evil<s%>; for who is <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H8199>judge<s%> this thy <S%H3515>great<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%>?
And the <S%H1697>speech<s%> <S%H3190>pleased<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%>, that <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> had <S%H7592>asked<s%> this <S%H1697>thing<s%>.

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H7592>him<s%>, Because thou hast asked this <S%H1697>thing<s%>, and hast not <S%H7592>asked<s%> for thyself <S%H7227>long<s%> <S%H3117>life<s%>, neither hast <S%H7592>asked<s%> <S%H6239>riches<s%> for <S%H7592>thyself<s%>, nor hast asked the <S%H5315>life<s%> of thine <S%H341>enemies<s%>, but hast <S%H7592>asked<s%> for thyself <S%H995>understanding<s%> to <S%H8085>discern<s%> <S%H4941>justice<s%>;

behold <S%H6213><s%>, I have done according to thy <S%H1697>word<s%>: <S%H5414>lo<s%>, I have given thee a <S%H2450>wise<s%> and an <S%H995>understanding<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%>; so that there hath been none like thee <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H310>thee<s%>, neither after thee shall any arise like unto <S%H6965>thee<s%>.

And I have also <S%H5414>given<s%> thee that which thou hast not <S%H7592>asked<s%>, both <S%H6239>riches<s%> and <S%H3519>honor<s%>, so that there shall not be <S%H376>any<s%> among the <S%H4428>kings<s%> like unto <S%H3117>thee<s%>, all thy days.

And if thou wilt <S%H3212>walk<s%> in my <S%H1870>ways<s%>, to <S%H8104>keep<s%> my <S%H2706>statutes<s%> and my <S%H4687>commandments<s%>, as thy <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> did <S%H1980>walk<s%>, then I will <S%H748>lengthen<s%> thy <S%H3117>days<s%>.

And <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H3364>awoke<s%>; <S%H2472>and<s%>, behold, it was a dream: and he <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, and <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and offered <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H5930>burnt-offerings<s%>, and <S%H6213>offered<s%> <S%H5930>peace-offerings<s%>, and <S%H6213>made<s%> a <S%H4960>feast<s%> to all his <S%H5650>servants<s%>.
Then there <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H802>women<s%> that were <S%H2181>harlots<s%>, unto the <S%H4428>king<s%>, and <S%H5975>stood<s%> before <S%H6440>him<s%>.

And the <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H994>Oh<s%>, my <S%H113>lord<s%>, I and this <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%>; and I was delivered of a <S%H3205>child<s%> with her in the <S%H1004>house<s%>.

And it came to pass the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> after I was <S%H3205>delivered<s%>, that this <S%H802>woman<s%> was <S%H3205>delivered<s%> <S%H3162>also<s%>; and we were together; there was no <S%H2114>stranger<s%> with us in the <S%H1004>house<s%>, <S%H2108>save<s%> we <S%H8147>two<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%>.
And this <S%H802>woman<s%>'s <S%H1121>child<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%> in the <S%H3915>night<s%>, because she lay upon <S%H7901>it<s%>.

And she <S%H6965>arose<s%> at <S%H8432>midnight<s%>, and <S%H3947>took<s%> my <S%H1121>son<s%> from <S%H681>beside<s%> <S%H519>me<s%>, while thy handmaid <S%H3463>slept<s%>, and <S%H7901>laid<s%> it in her <S%H2436>bosom<s%>, and <S%H7901>laid<s%> her <S%H4191>dead<s%> <S%H1121>child<s%> in my <S%H2436>bosom<s%>.

And when I <S%H6965>rose<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning<s%> to give my <S%H1121>child<s%> <S%H3243>suck<s%>, <S%H4191>behold<s%>, it was dead; but when I had <S%H995>looked<s%> at it in the <S%H1242>morning<s%>, <S%H1121>behold<s%>, it was not my son, whom I did <S%H3205>bear<s%>.

And the <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H2416>Nay<s%>; but the living is my <S%H1121>son<s%>, and the <S%H4191>dead<s%> is thy <S%H1121>son<s%>. And this <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H4191>No<s%>; but the dead is thy <S%H1121>son<s%>, and the <S%H2416>living<s%> is my <S%H1121>son<s%>. Thus they <S%H1696>spake<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>.

Then <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>, The <S%H2063>one<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%>, This is my <S%H1121>son<s%> that <S%H2416>liveth<s%>, and thy <S%H1121>son<s%> is the <S%H4191>dead<s%>: and the <S%H2063>other<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%>, <S%H1121>Nay<s%>; but thy son is the <S%H4191>dead<s%>, and my <S%H1121>son<s%> is the <S%H2416>living<s%>.
And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H3947>Fetch<s%> me a <S%H2719>sword<s%>. And they <S%H935>brought<s%> a <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>.

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H1504>Divide<s%> the <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H3206>child<s%> in <S%H8147>two<s%>, and <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H2677>half<s%> to the <S%H259>one<s%>, and <S%H2677>half<s%> to the <S%H259>other<s%>.

Then <S%H559>spake<s%> the <S%H802>woman<s%> whose the <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H1121>child<s%> was unto the <S%H4428>king<s%>, for her <S%H7356>heart<s%> <S%H3648>yearned<s%> over her <S%H1121>son<s%>, and she <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H994>Oh<s%>, my <S%H113>lord<s%>, <S%H5414>give<s%> her the <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H3205>child<s%>, and in no <S%H4191>wise<s%> <S%H4191>slay<s%> <S%H559>it<s%>. But the other said, It shall be neither mine nor <S%H1504>thine<s%>; divide it.

Then the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H5414>Give<s%> her the <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H3205>child<s%>, and in no <S%H4191>wise<s%> <S%H4191>slay<s%> <S%H517>it<s%>: she is the mother thereof.

And all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> of the <S%H4941>judgment<s%> which the <S%H4428>king<s%> had <S%H8199>judged<s%>; and they <S%H3372>feared<s%> the <S%H6440>king<s%>: for they <S%H7200>saw<s%> that the <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> was in <S%H7130>him<s%>, to <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H4941>justice<s%>.
